title: BUILD vs BUY Custom Mechanical Keyboard!
description: Check out the Focal Bathys at Headphones.com!   Razer Huntsman V2 on Amazon:  Drop CTRL Barebones:  Kailh Speed Copper Switches:  Drop MT3 Black on White Keycaps:  Krytox 205 Lube on Amazon:  Keyboard Lube Kit on Amazon:  Squirtle Keycap on Etsy:  DUROCK V2 Stabilizers on Amazon:  Nuphy Halo65 on Amazon:   Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:   By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Chapter Titles: 0:00 Intro 0:55 Not as Easy as it Looks 1:49 What's a "Budget"? 2:49 Headphones.com 4:06 The Most Popular Keyboard 5:00 How Hard Could it Be? 5:49 My Keyboard Parts 7:30 Switches 8:44 Keycaps 10:32 Desk Mat 11:39 How to Lube Switches 13:09 Behold, The Build 13:59 Razer vs Custom Build 14:42 Typing Test 15:56 Is the Huntsman Better? 16:35 Enter the Nuphy 17:14 Buy vs Build?
